metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13596 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Django 2.2 before 2.2.13 and 3.0 before 3.0.7.Query parameters generated by the Django admin ForeignKeyRawIdWidget werenot properly URL encoded, leading to a possibility of an XSS attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13596` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-django - 1.8.7-1ubuntu5.13
python-django-common - 1.8.7-1ubuntu5.13
python3-django - 1.8.7-1ubuntu5.13
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.7-1ubuntu5.13').
